Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. patthana11.9:3.1.pli: Naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. patthana12.1:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:3.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana12.1:4.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana12.1:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:6.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… nakamme ekaṃ …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ …pe… novigate tīṇi.

patthana12.1:7.1.pli: Nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana12.1:8.1.pli: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:9.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.

patthana12.1:10.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana12.1:11.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana12.1:12.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naahetukañca nanahetuṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko ca nanahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:13.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana12.1:14.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:15.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana12.1:16.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana12.1:17.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana12.1:18.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañca nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.1:20.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Yāva pañhāvārepi ekaṃ.)

patthana12.1:21.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana12.1:22.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana12.1:23.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana12.1:24.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana12.11:8.1.pli: Naajjhattikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabāhiraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana12.11:9.1.pli: Noupādā nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana12.11:10.1.pli: Naupādinnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana12.11:11.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana12.12:2.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana12.2:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana12.2:2.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana12.2:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naappaccayañca nanahetuṃ naappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naappaccayañca nanahetuṃ naappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
